abilities.name: Ivy Star

attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Bea
rules: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck, and attach any Energy cards you discarded in this way to your Benched Fighting Pokémon in any way you like.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Bede
rules: Attach a basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Crushing Hammer
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Digging Duo
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, look at the bottom 8 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. If tails, look at the bottom 3 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Energy Retrieval
rules: Put up to 2 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Energy Search
rules: Search your deck for a Basic Energy card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Energy Switch
rules: Move a basic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Friends in Hisui
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Friends in Sinnoh
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Great Ball
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon you find there and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Hop
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Leon
rules: During this turn, your Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Lost Vacuum
rules: You can use this card only if you put another card from your hand in the Lost Zone.Choose a Pokémon Tool attached to any Pokémon, or any Stadium in play, and put it in the Lost Zone.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Nessa
rules: Put up to 4 in any combination of Water Pokémon and Water Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Poké Ball
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Pokémon Catcher
rules: Switch your opponent's Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Potion
rules: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Raihan
rules: You can play this card only if any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn.Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon. If you do, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Rare Candy
rules: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 2 card in your hand that evolves from that Pokémon, put that card on the Basic Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) You can't use this card during your first turn or on a Basic Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Rescue Carrier
rules: Put up to 2 Pokémon, each with 90 HP or less, from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Switch
rules: Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Trekking Shoes
rules: Look at the top card of your deck. You may put that card into your hand. If you don't, discard that card and draw a card.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Ultra Ball
rules: You can use this card only if you discard 2 other cards from your hand.Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Elesa's Sparkle
rules: Choose up to 2 of your Fusion Strike Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, search your deck for a Fusion Strike Energy card and attach it to that Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Friends in Hisui
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Friends in Sinnoh
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Professor's Research
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Volo
rules: Discard 1 of your Benched Pokémon V and all attached cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

attacks.name: Wild Charge
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.
